resources.string: This app is to test the fighting mechanics for a game that\'s in the making. You will be able to select a character class and type with varying HP and Mana, then the game will immediately place you in the dungeon where you can select where you would like to go or do. Be careful as monsters will randomly spawn every time you make a move. You must fight them to gain experience points and obtain newer abilities(MAX 5 currently). Each monster will randomly drop one item which may assist you in the game play. The game saves after every monster you kill. Please note that this segment is to test fighting mechanics, and may contain bugs and glitches. Please do not get angry if your saved data is lost on system crashes. If there are any comments on this text system please Telegram Gareth.
